titleStmt.title: Maṣḥafa nǝfq “Book of the Assistant Priest” / Ṣalota ʿǝṭān “Prayer of Incense” / Bǝsratä Luqas “Gospel of Luke”

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary:
The Ms. contains the following texts: I) Maṣḥafa nәfq “Book of the Assistant Priest” (fols. 1r-12v, l.14) I-1) Prayer by the assistant priest receiving the host during the Prothesis (fol.1r, l.1-19): excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 22-25) I-2) Prayer of oblation (fols. 1, l.19-2r, l.5): excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 41-44.) I-3) Fәtḥat za-wald “Absolution of the Son” (fols. 2r, l.5-3r, l.15): excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 56-60). I-4) General absolution (fols. 3r, l.15-4r, l.16): excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 61-65). I-5) Concluding chant after the reading from the Pauline Epistles (fols. 4r, l.16-5r, l.3): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 132-135). I-6) Excerpt from the Acts of the Apostles, Acts 23:1-11 (fols. 5r, l.3-6r, l.18) I-7) Universal prayer by the assistant priest (fols. 6r, l.18-8r, l.6): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 194-209). I-8) Supplication for peace, the hierarchy and the assembly (fols. 8r, l.7-9r, l.4): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. IV, §§ 15-20). I-9) Prayer of blessing of St Basil (fols. 9r, l.4-10r, l.19): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qәddase za-ḥawaryat, §§ 10-21). I-10) Prayer before the congregation receives the Eucharist (fols. 10r, l.19-11r, l.5): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qәddase za-ḥawaryat, §§ 110-112). I-11) Prayer of intercession following the imposition of the celebrant‘s hand (fols. 11r, l.5-12v, l.14): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qәddase za-ḥawaryat, §§ 154-158). II) Ṣalota ʿәṭan “Prayer of Incense” (fols. 12v, l.14-30r, l.2) II-1) Prayer of Incense – excerpt from the introductory prayers (Ba-sälam ʾәmḫabä ʾәgziʾabәḥer ʾab…) (fols. 12v, l.14-14r, l.1) II-2) Prayer of Incense - Prayer of offering incense (Täwäkkäf ʾәgziʾo ʾәṭanänä…) (fols. 14r, l.1-14v, l.9) II-3) Supplication for offering the incense (Nәsʾәl wa-nastäbäqwәʾ ḫirutä śänayatikä ʾәgziʾo…) (fols. 14v, l.9-15r, l.10) II-4) Undefined Prayer of incense (ʾƎgziʾabәḥer ʿabiy wәʾәtu la-ʿālam ba-qädami za-ʾiyäḫallәq…) (fols. 15r, l.10-16r, l.14) II-5) Prayer of offering incense (Täwäkkäf ʾәgziʾo ʾәmneyä ʾanä ḫaṭʾә wäʾabasi zäntä ʿәṭan…) (fols. 16r, l.14-16v, l.1) II-6) Prayer of Incense - Supplication for offering the incense (Nәsʾәläkkä ʾәgziʾo wa-nastäbäqwәʾ ʾamlakәna bäkämä śämärkä qwәrbanä ʾabel…) (fol. 16v, l.1-16v, l.15) II-7) Monitions (fols. 16v, l.15-17r, l.13) II-8) Benediction (Ṣägga za-ʾab ḫirut za-wald sutāfe za-manfas täfaqro…) (fols. 17r, l.13-17v, l.3) II-9) Prayer for the hierarchy (ʾƎgziʾabәḥer yähabo la-bәḍuʿ wäläqәddus liqa ṗaṗasat…) (fols. 17v, l.3-18r, l.13) II-10) Prayer of offering incense (ʾAbäwәʿ läkä ʾәṭan mәslä ḫaragit kärbe…) (fols. 18r, l.13-18v, l.8) II-11) Prayer of incense – Intercessory prayer (Nәsebḥakä ʾәgziʾo la-ʾaḫze kwullu ʾaläm…) (fols. 18v, l.8-23v, l.3) II-12) Prayer of Jeremy (Qәddus, qәddus, qәddus, ʾantä mäʿaza ṭәʿum…) (fols. 23v, l.4-24r, l.4) II-13) Prayer for chrism and incense (Näʾakkwәtäkä ʾabuhu la-ʾәgziʾәnä…) (fols. 24, l.5-24r, l.16) II-14) Prayer for request (ʾƎgziʾabәḥer ʾәgziʾәyä ʾIyasus Krәstos wa-manfas qәddus sәmaʿ ʾәgziʾo zäntä sәʾәläta…) (fols. 24r, l.17-24v, l.14) II-15) Prayer for the dead (ʾƎgziʾo gәbär täzkarä śänayä la-ʾagbәrtikä…) (fols. 24v, l.14-25r, l.7) II-16) Prayer of incense - Prayer of thanksgiving (ʾAʾakkwәto wa-ʾaleʿәlo wa-ʾәsebbәḥo…) (fols. 25r, l.7-25v, l.4) II-17) Prayer of thanksgiving (ʾƎm-mәśraq wa-ʾәm-mәʿәrab yәtʾakkwät…) (fols. 25v, l.4-30r, l.1) III) Excerpt from the Gospel of Luke, 1:39-56 (fols. 30r, l.2-31r)
Additio 1.

msItem.note: Text I presents a collection of passages excerpted from the Missal (the Maṣḥafa qǝddāse), which are read only by the assistant priest during the liturgy, as follows:
I-1) Excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śǝrʿatä qǝddāse, ch. III, §§ 22-25)
I-2) Excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śǝrʿatä qǝddāse, ch. III, §§ 41-44.)
I-3) Excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śǝrʿatä qǝddāse, ch. III, §§ 56-60).
I-4) Excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śǝrʿatä qǝddāse, ch. III, §§ 61-65).
I-5) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śǝrʿatä qǝddāse, ch. III, §§132-135).
I-6) Excerpt from the Acts of the Apostles, Acts 23:1-11, transcription of a monition from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śǝrʿatä qǝddāse, ch. III, §§ 148)
I-7) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śǝrʿatä qǝddāse, ch. III, §§194-209).
I-8) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śǝrʿatä qǝddāse, ch. IV, §§ 15-20).
I-9) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qǝddāse za-ḥawaryat, §§ 10-21).
I-10) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qǝddāse za-ḥawaryat, §§110-112).
I-11) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qǝddāse za-ḥawaryat, §§154-158).

Text II presents a collection of text mainly excerpted from the Ṣalota ʿǝṭān “Prayer of Incense” (published in 1951 E.C. (1958 AD.) in Addis Ababa). With the exception of the beginning of the work, the sequence of texts is very close to the one of Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān “Prayer of offering incense”, present at the end of the Vatican edition of the Maṣḥafa säʿatat “horologium” (published in 1945 E.C. (1952 AD.) in Rome), on p.381-410. Here is the sequence of texts in Text II and their probable origin:
II-1) Prayer of Incense: excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p. 20-22.
II-2) Prayer of Incense: excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p. 123.
II-3) Supplication for offering the incense: excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p. 147.
II-4) Prayer of incense: Undefined.
II-5) Prayer of offering incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p. 383.
II-6) Prayer of Incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p.383-384; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p. 131.
II-7) Monitions: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p. 384; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p.131-132.
II-8) Benediction: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p. 394; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p. 132.
II-9) Prayer for the hierarchy: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p.394-395; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p.132-134.
II-10) Prayer of offering incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p.395-396; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p. 131.
II-11) Prayer of incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p.396-402; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p.137-142.
II-12) Prayer of Jeremy: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p.402-403; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p.142-143.
II-13) Prayer for chrism and incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p. 403; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p. 152.
II-14) Prayer for request: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p.403-404; similar but not identical to Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p. 143
II-15) Prayer for the dead: similar but not identical to Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p.143-144.
II-16) Prayer of incense - Prayer of thanksgiving: excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p. 404; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p. 146.
II-17) Prayer of thanksgiving : excerpt from Maṣḥafa säʿatat - Ṣalota mäbaʾa ʿǝṭān, p.405-410; excerpt from Ṣalota ʿǝṭān, p.147-152.

supportDesc.condition: Some folios damaged by rodents (e.g. fols. 16, 17, 26, 27, 30, 31). The sewing is damaged at the upper pair of sewing stations.

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

handDesc.handNote: Careful. Black; red. Walda Muse.Walda Muse is mentioned as the scribe in supplication formula, fol. 30r, l.1Second half of 19th cent.

decoDesc.decoNote: Nomina sacra; names of the donor, the King, and the Metropolitan; incipit of Text I and its subsections; Text II and its subsections; incipit of Text III; elements of punctuation; elements of Ethiopic numerals. In the incipit page of Text I, two lines are rubricated alternating with black lines (s. fol. 1r).
f. 1r: Simple uncoloured horizontal ornamental band.
f. 31r: Narrow coloured (black, red) horizontal ornamental band.

list.item:
f. 31r, l.7: Unclear note (exhortation to the priests?)f. 31r, l.7: [vac.] አጋምዮ፡[vac.] ልደ፡ ጊዮ[vac.] ያ። ወ[vac.] አንትሙ[vac.]፡ ፩አቡነ፡ ዘማያ[vac.]። ፈዓዓ።
Mention of ʾAgamyo church; possibly also of the donor Walda Giyorgis.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards. Two pairs of sewing stations.
Holes close to the head (quire I).

origin.origDate: Mention of King Yoḥannǝs IV (r. 1872-89) in fols. 7r, 17v, 20v and mention of Metropolitan Ṗeṭros (in tenure 1881-1917) in fols. 8r, 15v and 21v.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

person.persName: Walda Giyorgis (?) (s. Additio 1); Walda ʾAnanya (?) (s. fol. 12v, l. 14).

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5
